howItWorks.title: Streamlined Process
howItWorks.subtitle: How Hirelytics Works
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered platform streamlines the entire recruitment journey from job posting to final selection.

step1.title: Create Job Posting
step1.description: Recruiters create detailed job postings with requirements, responsibilities, and qualifications.
step1.subtitle: Job Description Creation
step1.detail: The platform helps optimize job descriptions to attract the right candidates.

step2.title: Generate Application URL
step2.description: The system automatically generates a unique application URL for each job posting.
step2.subtitle: Unique Application Link
step2.detail: Each job gets a custom URL that can be shared across platforms and social media.

step3.title: Candidate Application
step3.description: Candidates apply through the unique URL, creating a streamlined application experience.
step3.subtitle: Easy Application Process
step3.detail: Candidates can apply with a simple, user-friendly interface designed for the best experience.

step4.title: Resume Analysis
step4.description: Our AI analyzes the candidate's resume to extract skills, experience, and qualifications.
step4.subtitle: Intelligent Resume Parsing
step4.detail: Advanced AI extracts and analyzes key information from resumes to match with job requirements.

step5.title: AI-Powered Interview
step5.description: The AI conducts an adaptive interview, asking questions based on the candidate's resume and responses.
step5.subtitle: Dynamic Conversation
step5.detail: The AI adapts questions based on previous answers to thoroughly assess candidate skills.

step6.title: Comprehensive Feedback
step6.description: Both recruiters and candidates receive detailed feedback and insights from the interview process.
step6.subtitle: Actionable Insights
step6.detail: Detailed reports help recruiters make informed decisions and candidates understand their performance.
